6020572022353424187227414224514292250225410482432{0 2)}{*02162} 250195{0
3)}The bar I'm in is on the roof of the tallest building in3 Sirius
Mater, more than a mile above the streets. Even from8 here I can hear
the stock market crashing. It started with4 the collapse of spacecraft
companies with no hulls to build1 ships. Hundreds of others have
followed. It takes a long time7 for an interstellar market to come apart
at the seams, but,as with the Core novas, I don't see anything that can
stop5 the chain reaction.-92{0 4)}{*02162} 2501952{0 5)}{*02162}
-21072357532722250582245482240431422503410225914192240144322455322352224163225014149224014224510168224051732245178110332
You see, Pa and some scientist friends of his had figured 4 out part of
what was going to happen-they'd known we'd 0 get captured and our air
would freeze-and they'd been work-3 ing like mad to fix up a place with
airtight walls and doors, and insulation against the cold, and big
supplies of food and fuel and water and bottled air. But the place got
smashed in 7 the last earthquakes and all Pa's friends were killed then
and in the Big Jerk. So he had to start over and throw

white02057024037219229110336 helmet like Pa's homemade ones, only

NOTICE TO ALL TENANTS

one limb out and tie it fast."0205702011033221 "And pull the other limb

then-"0205702022592245145322545322456722358222323224034142250242240192422692245242422451924225052922453422323223548142245431911033-221

Afterword020570202107302{0 1)}{*02311} 240142{0 2)}Some catastrophes may
take place in the near future,-1 even tomorrow, but are so extremely
low-probability that itmakes no sense to worry about them
excessively.-111{0 3)}Some catastrophes are high-probability and 0 may
take-4 place in the near-future, even tomorrow. It is only these which-2
must concern us now.-92245105224019} ␀
